originalText.text: If you are looking to obtain Medical Examiner’s Certificate for your CDL, Dr. Marshall is a great help! The appointment is not too long, the office is clean, and the examination is right on point. Dr. Marshall is sharp and thorough. Highly recommend!

text.text: If you are looking to obtain Medical Examiner’s Certificate for your CDL, Dr. Marshall is a great help! The appointment is not too long, the office is clean, and the examination is right on point. Dr. Marshall is sharp and thorough. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Dr. Susan B Marshall is an excellent internist with a background in nephrology.  Dr. Marshall accepts insurance and takes a personal interest in her patients. She returns emails promptly and even answers her own phone.  It just doesn't get better than that. She recently moved her office to the corner of CPW and West 85th St. The entrance is on 85th Street and the new office is lovely.

originalText.text:
Dr. Susan Marshall is by far the best physician I’ve ever had in my life!

I’ve been with her for over five years and she’s been nothing more than attentive, methodical and precise with her care. Susan Marshall gives a personal touch in her service that is surpassed by none!

If you were looking for a boutique physician, who cares about her patience and goes the extra mile outside of a 9 to 5, Dr. Susan Marshall is the physician for you!

I am beyond privileged to have her as my primary healthcare physician!

Ricardo A. Anthony

originalText.text: she did an amazing job! highly recommend her. You won't be disappointed.

originalText.text: Waited 40 minutes after my appointment time to be seen. When I went up to the front desk to ask if I was going to be seen soon the woman scoffed and turned away. Mind you this isn’t a teenager, but someone who is well into there 40s and isn’t getting younger anytime soon. I finally get escorted to the back. The nurse complains about her heart burn from lunch. There’s a elderly person dementia screaming down the hall. I finally get seen only to be lectured about safe sex and slapped with a prescription on the basis of a pure guess. I call a week later to say this isn’t working and the doctor tells me to wait a week, I call back in a week, she tells me to actually wait a month. What happens when i called her in a month you ask? I didn’t because I found a new Urologist by then.
